languages.text: Останки людей чудовищно изуродованы. Плоть словно оплавилась по краям и густо покрыта зловонной слизью.

traits.locale_text: Останки людей чудовищно изуродованы. Плоть словно оплавилась по краям и густо покрыта зловонной слизью.
Останки людей чудовищно изуродованы. Плоть словно оплавилась по краям и густо покрыта зловонной слизью.

languages.text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.
languages.original_text: Останки людей чудовищно изуродованы. Плоть словно оплавилась по краям и густо покрыта зловонной слизью.

traits.locale_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.
The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.
The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.
The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

languages.text: 这些人的尸体惨遭肢解。肉体的边缘似乎已经融化了，上面密布着恶臭的粘液。
languages.original_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

traits.locale_text: 这些人的尸体惨遭肢解。肉体的边缘似乎已经融化了，上面密布着恶臭的粘液。

languages.text: Los cadáveres se han mutilado de formas espantosas. Su carne parece haberse derretido en los extremos y está cubierta de un denso moco hediondo.
languages.original_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

traits.locale_text: Los cadáveres se han mutilado de formas espantosas. Su carne parece haberse derretido en los extremos y está cubierta de un denso moco hediondo.

languages.text: 人々の遺体はひどく切り刻まれている。肉は端から溶けているようで、悪臭を放つ粘液が厚く付着している。
languages.original_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

traits.locale_text: 人々の遺体はひどく切り刻まれている。肉は端から溶けているようで、悪臭を放つ粘液が厚く付着している。

languages.text: Die Überreste der Leute wurden grausam verstümmelt. Das Fleisch scheint an den Rändern geschmolzen zu sein und ist mit stinkendem Schleim bedeckt.
languages.original_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

traits.locale_text: Die Überreste der Leute wurden grausam verstümmelt. Das Fleisch scheint an den Rändern geschmolzen zu sein und ist mit stinkendem Schleim bedeckt.

languages.text: Les cadavres de ces pauvres bougres ont été atrocement mutilés. Leur chair fondue aux extrémités est recouverte d'une épaisse couche de mucus pestilentiel.
languages.original_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

traits.locale_text: Les cadavres de ces pauvres bougres ont été atrocement mutilés. Leur chair fondue aux extrémités est recouverte d'une épaisse couche de mucus pestilentiel.

languages.text: İnsan cesetleri, korkunç bir şekilde parçalanmış. Etler, kenarlarından erimiş ve pis kokulu bir mukusla kaplanmış.
languages.original_text: The people's remains have been hideously mutilated. The flesh seems to have melted at the edges and is thickly coated in stinking mucus.

traits.locale_text: İnsan parçaları korkunç bir şekilde parçalanmış. Etler, kenarlarından erimiş ve pis kokulu bir mukusla kaplanmış.
